select user_id, username, email, r.role_id as r_role_id, r.role_name as r_role_name from user as u inner join role as r on r.role_id = u.role_id

select user_id, username, email, p.post_id as p_post_id, p.title as p_title, p_t.id as p_t_id, p_t.name as p_t_name from user as u left join post as p on p.author_id = u.user_id inner join post_tag as p_t on p_t.id = p.tag_id
and u.user_id = #{id}
